title: Prashant Kishor says ‘will retire’ if Nitish Kumar fulfils promise to transfer Rs 2 lakh to women
text:
Prashant Kishor of the Jan Suraaj, in his first media interaction since the Bihar Assembly election 2025 results, took full responsibility for the party’s drubbing in the poll, and claimed that he would quit politics if Nitish Kumar delivers his promise of transferring Rs 2 lakh to 1.5 crore women.

During his poll campaign, sensing strong anti-incumbency, the political-analyst-turned-politician had said he would resign from politics if the Nitish Kumar-led Janata Dal United won more than 25 seats in the assembly elections.
